pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyDOODS - Python for Distributed Open Object Detection ServiceThis is a simple Python wrapper for the [DOODS](https://github.com/snowzach/doods) service. DOODS allows you to do remote object detection in images easily. A simple example using this library:```import PyDOODS from pydoodstry: pd = PyDOODS("http://docker:8080", auth_key="abc1234", timeout=90)except OSError as err: print("OS error: {0}".format(err)) exitimage = open("grace_hopper.png", "rb").read()print(pd.detect(image))```
